com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.string.joiner
Class Joiner2Utils

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.object.StatelessObject
      com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.string.joiner.Joiner2Utils
All Implemented Interfaces:
IJoiner2Utils
@FullyTested
public final class Joiner2Utils
extends StatelessObject
implements IJoiner2Utils

Constants and static utilities for Joiner2 and MapJoiner2.

Author:
Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
See Also:
withSeparator(String), withSeparator(char), newQuotingJoinerFactory(String), newQuotingJoinerFactory(char), StatelessObject, IJoiner2Utils

public static final Joiner2Utils INSTANCE

DEFAULT_NULL_TEXT

public static final String DEFAULT_NULL_TEXT
Default value for Joiner2Settings.useForNull(): "null".

This default differs from class Joiner, which uses null, and throws a NullPointerException when joining a null value, unless Joiner.useForNull(String) is called before joining.

See Also:
Joiner2Settings.useForNull(String), Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_SKIP_NULLS_FLAG

public static final boolean DEFAULT_SKIP_NULLS_FLAG

Constructor Detail

Joiner2Utils

public Joiner2Utils()
For projects that require total, static-free mocking capabilities, use this constructor. Else, the static constant INSTANCE will suffice.

Method Detail

withSeparator

public Joiner2 withSeparator(String separator)
Constructs a new instance of Joiner2.

Specified by:
withSeparator in interface IJoiner2Utils
Parameters:
separator - String to insert between elements during join. Must not be null, but can be "" (empty string). Example: ", " (comma + space)
Returns:
new instance
See Also:
IJoiner2Utils.withSeparator(char), SharedJoiner2Settings.withSeparator(String), SharedJoiner2Settings.withSeparator(char)

newQuotingJoinerFactory

public Joiner2Factory newQuotingJoinerFactory(String separator)
Constructs a new instance of Joiner2Factory. Unless an additional layer of indirection is required for mocking or testing, it is usually sufficient to call IJoiner2Utils.withSeparator(String).

Specified by:
newQuotingJoinerFactory in interface IJoiner2Utils
Parameters:
separator - String to insert between elements during join. Must not be null, but can be "" (empty string). Example: ", " (comma + space)
Returns:
new instance
